text: An Episode in the Life of an Iron Picker () is a 2013 Bosnian French Slovenian drama movie written and directed by Danis Tanović. It stars Nazif Mujić, Senada Alimanović, Šemsa Mujić and Sandra Mujić. == Other websites == * Category:2013 drama movies Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina movies Category:French drama movies Category:Slovenian movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Danis Tanović
title: An Episode in the Life of an Iron Picker
